Modern living room: a modern living room with a gray modular sofa, matte gray walls, warm oak floor, and a dark wood kitchen
Scandinavian bedroom: a cozy Scandinavian bedroom with linen bedding, light wood furniture, and soft natural textures
Art-deco bathroom: an art-deco style bathroom with marble surfaces, golden fixtures, and a freestanding tub
Minimalist kitchen: a minimalist kitchen with flat-front dark cabinets, a striking marble backsplash, and a wooden dining table with black chairs
Loft office: a loft-style office with concrete ceiling, large windows, metal frames, and warm wooden desktops
